alert.note: Alert for Washington (Rhode Island) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 12 at 6:38PM EST until December 12 at 10:54PM EST by NWS Boston
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Massachusetts...Rhode Island... Shawsheen River At Andover affecting Essex County. Pawtuxet River At Cranston affecting Providence and Kent Counties. ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Rhode Island... Wood River At Hope Valley affecting Washington County. ...The Flood Warning is cancelled for the following rivers in Connecticut... Connecticut River At Middle Haddam affecting Middlesex County. For the Shawsheen River...including Wilmington, Andover...Minor flooding is forecast. For the Pawtuxet River...including Scituate Reservoir, Cranston... Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Wood River at Hope Valley. * WHEN...Until late this evening. * IMPACTS...At 5.0 feet, In Richmond, floodwaters begin to pond onto Wood River Drive. In Hopkinton off of Main Street, the Wood River begins to flood Dow Park. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 4:15 PM EST Tuesday the stage was 5.3 feet. - Bankfull stage is 5.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 4:15 PM EST Tuesday was 6.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall to 3.2 feet Friday morning. - Flood stage is 5.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 5.3 feet on 02/16/1953. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this evening at 745 PM EST.
